content: I'm planning to play it on release day, I've already pre-ordered it and I'm really excited about it. I've been watching all the developer diaries and gameplay demos, and it looks amazing. I'm hoping my PC can handle it, I've been researching the system requirements and I think I might need to upgrade my graphics card to ensure smooth performance. Do you think the game will have a strong focus on storytelling, or will it be more action-oriented?
